video.name: BASIL JALAPENO CORN FRITTERS. Vegan Glutenfree | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Basil Jalapeno Corn Fritters. Easy Gluten-free Vegan Corn Fritters.
FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2016/08/basil-jalapeno-corn-fritters.html

Corn Fritters with jalapeno, basil and black pepper. Serve with ketchup, vegan ranch or chutneys of choice. Soy-free Recipe. Great as snack or appetizer for gameday/party.

More Superbowl Snackage like Vegan Mozzarella Sticks, Kung Pao Cauliflower Bites, Dips here : https://www.veganricha.com/2017/01/40-vegan-party-food-recipes.html


BUY MY COOKBOOK: http://www.veganricha.com/vegan-richas-everyday-kitchen 

SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1
#vegan #veganism #easyveganrecipes #veganrecipes #veganricha #cooking

recipeIngredient: 2 loaded cups frozen sweet corn (thawed, or fresh corn off the cob)
1  Jalapeno (seeded and finely chopped, or use Serrano pepper (remove seeds for less heat))

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, add all the ingredients corn through baking powder including the baking powder. Toss well to distribute.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, add all the ingredients corn through baking powder including the baking powder. Toss well to distribute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add water and mix. Add enough water until the mixture is pasty but not a batter. There will be more corn than batter. (Add a tbsp of flaxseed meal to the mix if the fritters dont hold up too well on the skillet in the next step)
recipeInstructions.name: Add water and mix. Add enough water until the mixture is pasty but not a batter. There will be more corn than batter. (Add a tbsp of flaxseed meal to the mix if the fritters dont hold up too well on the skillet in the next step)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a skillet over medium heat. Spray or spread oil on the skillet. Drop large spoonfuls of the mixture on the hot skillet and spread to make a roundish shape. Cook until golden brown on both sides. 4 to 5 minutes per side.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat a skillet over medium heat. Spray or spread oil on the skillet. Drop large spoonfuls of the mixture on the hot skillet and spread to make a roundish shape. Cook until golden brown on both sides. 4 to 5 minutes per side.

recipeInstructions.text: Repeat for all fritters. Serve with chutneys, ketchup, guacamole or vegan ranch.
recipeInstructions.name: Repeat for all fritters. Serve with chutneys, ketchup, guacamole or vegan ranch.

@graph.keywords: glutenfree corn fritters, summer corn fritters, vegan corn fritters
